overview: Girls looking for attention with rehab...lesbian style! They went to rehab in search of help with their addictions, but what they found was way more therapeutic than they bargained for! Katja Kassin and Staci Silvertone, along with other stunning beauties, turn a rehab center into an erotic lesbian hideaway! Their therapy sessions end with scissoring. Their meditation leads to cunnilingus! And let's not get started on how they spend their free time!
title: Lesbian Rehab
